title: geting kicked from low priority
body: I've sat through about 4 low priority queues and each time when it got down to one minute league would disconnect or the lobby would crash.

replies.body: You're gonna want to troubleshoot this connection a bit before hopping back in the queue, since having your client mess up while in an LPQ can eventually make those last longer. Let's be sure you adjust your port forwarding to send your connection along a better route, but also flush your DNS as well. If you're not sure how to do those, hit up this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some easy steps.
